name: Hacked'n Slashn't
description:
The deep lore

You've been possessed by a devil... And that's it! This devil will try to harm anyone that crosses your path... Unless YOU avoid it.
You will start attacking automatically without being able to control it. All you can do is move to try to avoid hitting people for the longest you can!

How to play

  • You will gain points depending on the time you manage to keep people safe!
  • The demon will manifest and attack the people. The more time you resist, the stronger the devil will become. Avoid hitting those innocent pedestrians!

How to lose

  • Kill 3 people and the game ends. Evil is stronger than you.
  • Get struck by a car and DIE.

How to win

  • You won't. The devil will win, or you will eventually D I E.

How does this game fit the theme of the jam?

This is a Hack'n Slash... But you can't use your abilities. In fact, they are used automatically, so you have to play around it. That would be easy, because there's a lot of people to kill, right? No, are you crazy? People don't kill people, so avoid hitting those poor souls!
